page.title: 10EVENTS-THE HORSE TRAILS
page.content: The Horse Trails start on the first week of May It is held at Bodynfoel hall by kind Permission of Major and Mrs Bonnor Maurice and the competitors come from the British IsIes.They are held for two days the competitors know it as two day eventing.The first day is dressage and show jumping.The next day is cross country. The dressage competition takes place in a rectangular arena. Each competitor must show control of their horse, and must show a good obedient horse. The cross countryis a course of ups and downs and you are timed. There is a steeple chase I did'nt tell you about , and there is a number of jumps to jump in a certain time.
